DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate bioequivalence ( way different form drug absorbed body ) single-dose administration domestic ( make China ) mizolastine tablet import mizolastine tablet give dose healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Domestic ( Made China ) Imported Mizolastine Tablets Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , randomize ( study medication assign chance ) , crossover ( method use switch patient one treatment arm another clinical study ) study . Approximately , 24 healthy volunteer enrol study . Eligible volunteer randomly allocate either Sequence A group Sequence B group . On Day 1 , volunteer Sequence A group receive import mizolastine tablet volunteer Sequence B group receive domestic mizolastine tablet . There washout period ( treatment ) 7 Days . On Day 8 , two sequence group switch . Volunteers Sequence A group receive domestic mizolastine volunteer Sequence B group receive import mizolastine tablet . Safety evaluation include assessment adverse event , clinical laboratory test , electrocardiogram , vital sign , physical examination , measure throughout study . The maximum study duration volunteer approximately 16 day .
